articles.description: "It seems inevitable that there was going to be some payback in corporate earnings this year," investment chief Lisa Shalett said.
articles.content: A string of eye-catching earnings misses by tech and retail leaders signals it's payback time for stocks boosted by pandemic-era stimulus and that could pull markets lower, according to Morgan Stanle… [+3409 chars]
